default: I’m a junior Flutter developer with hands-on experience building real features from scratch, including authentication flows, state management, local storage, and API integration.I believe good apps are built with:Clear architecturePredictable stateThoughtful UI/UXContinuous learningI’m currently focused on sharpening my skills to reach a solid junior-to-mid level through consistent practice and real-world scenarios.
